moves.name: Accelerock
moves.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. This attack does massive damage if the user isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Anchor Shot
moves.desc: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Aqua Cutter
moves.desc: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Aqua Step
moves.desc: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with open-palmed arm thrusts. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Assurance
moves.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has already taken some damage in the same turn.

moves.name: Astonish
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by crying out in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Attack Order
moves.desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Aura Wheel
moves.desc: Morpeko attacks and boosts its Speed stat with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move's type changes depending on the user's form.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target has inflicted damage on the user in the same turn.

moves.name: Axe Kick
moves.desc: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

moves.name: Barb Barrage
moves.desc: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move's power is doubled if the target is already poisoned.

moves.name: Beak Blast
moves.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the user while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.desc: The user gets all party Pokémon to attack the target. The more party Pokémon, the greater the number of attacks.

moves.name: Behemoth Bash
moves.desc: The user's body becomes a firm shield and slams into the target fiercely.

moves.name: Behemoth Blade
moves.desc: The user wields a large, powerful sword using its whole body and cuts the target in a vigorous attack.

moves.name: Bind
moves.desc: A long body, tentacles, or the like are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Bite
moves.desc: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Bitter Blade
moves.desc: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Blaze Kick
moves.desc: The user launches a kick that has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Blazing Torque
moves.desc: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may Burn the opponent

moves.name: Body Press
moves.desc: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user's Defense stat, the greater the damage this move deals.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.desc: The user attacks by dropping onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bolt Beak
moves.desc: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. This move's power is doubled if the user moves before the target.

moves.name: Bolt Strike
moves.desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bone Rush
moves.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with a hard bone. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Bonemerang
moves.desc: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to damage the target twice—coming and going.

moves.name: Bounce
moves.desc: The user bounces up high on the first turn, then drops onto the target on the next turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Branch Poke
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

moves.name: Brave Bird
moves.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Breaking Swipe
moves.desc: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.desc: The user attacks with a swift chop. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Brutal Swing
moves.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.desc: The user attacks by biting the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

moves.name: Bullet Punch
moves.desc: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Bullet Seed
moves.desc: The user attacks by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Ceaseless Edge
moves.desc: The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack remain scattered under the target as spikes.

moves.name: Circle Throw
moves.desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.desc: The user fights the target up close, inflicting damage without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Collision Course
moves.desc: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

moves.name: Combat Torque
moves.desc: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may lower the opponent's Defense

moves.name: Comeuppance
moves.desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

moves.name: Counter
moves.desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any physical move, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Covet
moves.desc: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

moves.name: Crabhammer
moves.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.desc: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Crush Claw
moves.desc: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Crush Grip
moves.desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Cut
moves.desc: The target is cut with a scythe, a claw, or the like to inflict damage.

moves.name: Darkest Lariat
moves.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

moves.name: Diamond Storm
moves.Desc: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also sharply boost the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Dig
moves.desc: The user burrows into the ground on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Dire Claw
moves.desc: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or asleep.

moves.name: Dive
moves.desc: The user dives on the first turn, then floats up and attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Double Hit
moves.desc: The user slams the target with a tail or the like. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Double Iron Bash
moves.desc: The user uses the hex nut in its chest as an axis to spin, striking the target with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.desc: The user attacks by kicking the target twice in a row using two feet.

moves.name: Double Shock
moves.desc: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.desc: A reckless life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Dragon Ascent
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by dropping out of the sky at high speed. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Dragon Claw
moves.desc: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

moves.name: Dragon Darts
moves.desc: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two opposing Pokémon, this move hits each of them once.

moves.name: Dragon Rush
moves.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.desc: The user attacks with an energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Drill Peck
moves.desc: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

moves.name: Drill Run
moves.desc: The user crashes into the target while rotating its body like a drill. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Drum Beating
moves.desc: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum's roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Dual Wingbeat
moves.desc: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.desc: The user attacks by punching the target with full concentrated power. This also confuses the target.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.desc: The user inflicts damage by cutting down the target's HP to roughly equal the user's HP.

moves.name: Explosion
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.desc: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Facade
moves.desc: This move's power is doubled if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

moves.name: Fake Out
moves.desc: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

moves.name: False Surrender
moves.desc: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

moves.name: False Swipe
moves.desc: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Feint
moves.desc: This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat is boosted drastically.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Lash
moves.desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a fiery punch. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: First Impression
moves.desc: Although this move has great power, it works only on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

moves.name: Fishious Rend
moves.desc: The user rends the target with its hard gills. This move's power is doubled if the user moves before the target.

moves.name: Fissure
moves.Desc: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Flail
moves.desc: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Flame Charge
moves.desc: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks the target. Then, building up momentum, the user boosts its Speed stat.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.desc: The user attacks by cloaking itself in fire and charging at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fling
moves.desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

moves.name: Flip Turn
moves.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Flower Trick
moves.desc: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

moves.name: Fly
moves.desc: The user flies up into the sky on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Flying Press
moves.desc: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.desc: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before using the move.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.desc: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

moves.name: Freeze Shock
moves.desc: The turn after using this move, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.desc: The user attacks by jabbing the target with a horn, a beak, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with scythes, claws, or the like. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.desc: The user attacks by raking the target with claws, scythes, or the like. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Fusion Bolt
moves.desc: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous flame.

moves.name: Gear Grind
moves.desc: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at the target twice in a row.

moves.name: Giga Impact
moves.desc: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Gigaton Hammer
moves.desc: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

moves.name: Glacial Lance
moves.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blizzard-cloaked icicle lance at opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Glaive Rush
moves.desc: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. Attacks from opposing Pokémon during the next turn cannot miss and will inflict double damage.

moves.name: Grassy Glide
moves.desc: Gliding on the ground, the user attacks the target. This move always goes first on Grassy Terrain.

moves.name: Grav Apple
moves.desc: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.Desc: A vicious tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Gunk Shot
moves.desc: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.desc: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Head Charge
moves.desc: The user charges its head into the target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Head Smash
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a hazardous full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.desc: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Headlong Rush
moves.desc: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Heat Crash
moves.desc: The user slams into the target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.desc: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: High Horsepower
moves.desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

moves.name: Hold Back
moves.desc: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

moves.name: Horn Attack
moves.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Horn Drill
moves.Desc: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Horn Leech
moves.desc: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Hyper Drill
moves.desc: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

moves.name: Hyperspace Fury
moves.desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. This also lowers the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

moves.name: Ice Hammer
moves.desc: The user swings its strong, heavy fist at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.desc: The target is attacked with an icy punch. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.desc: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Ice Spinner
moves.desc: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

moves.name: Icicle Crash
moves.desc: The user attacks by crashing large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.desc: The user attacks by launching sharp icicles at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.desc: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.desc: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Jaw Lock
moves.desc: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

moves.name: Jet Punch
moves.desc: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.desc: The user slaps down the target's held item, making it unusable for that battle. This move does more damage if the target has a held item.

moves.name: Kowtow Cleave
moves.desc: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Land's Wrath
moves.desc: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to inflict damage.

moves.name: Lash Out
moves.desc: The user lashes out to vent its frustration toward the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's stats were lowered during this turn.

moves.name: Last Resort
moves.desc: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

moves.name: Last Respects
moves.desc: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Leaf Blade
moves.desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and cuts the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Leafage
moves.desc: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.desc: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Lick
moves.desc: The user licks the target with a long tongue to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Liquidation
moves.desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.desc: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Lunge
moves.desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Mach Punch
moves.desc: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Magical Torque
moves.desc: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may confuse the opponent

moves.name: Max Airstream
moves.desc: This is a Flying-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This boosts ally Pokémon's Speed stats.

moves.name: Max Darkness
moves.desc: This is a Dark-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Max Flare
moves.desc: This is a Fire-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

moves.name: Max Flutterby
moves.desc: This is a Bug-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Max Geyser
moves.desc: This is a Water-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

moves.name: Max Hailstorm
moves.desc: This is an Ice-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

moves.name: Max Knuckle
moves.desc: This is a Fighting-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This boosts ally Pokémon's Attack stats.

moves.name: Max Lightning
moves.desc: This is an Electric-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns.

moves.name: Max Mindstorm
moves.desc: This is a Psychic-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Psychic Terrain for five turns.

moves.name: Max Ooze
moves.desc: This is a Poison-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This boosts ally Pokémon's Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Max Overgrowth
moves.desc: This is a Grass-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns.

moves.name: Max Phantasm
moves.desc: This is a Ghost-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Max Quake
moves.desc: This is a Ground-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This boosts ally Pokémon's Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Max Rockfall
moves.desc: This is a Rock-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user summons a sandstorm lasting five turns.

moves.name: Max Starfall
moves.desc: This is a Fairy-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. The user turns the ground into Misty Terrain for five turns.

moves.name: Max Steelspike
moves.desc: This is a Steel-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This boosts ally Pokémon's Defense stats.

moves.name: Max Strike
moves.desc: This is a Normal-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Max Wyrmwind
moves.desc: This is a Dragon-type attack Dynamax Pokémon use. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Mega Kick
moves.desc: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle- packed power.

moves.name: Mega Punch
moves.desc: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle- packed power.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.desc: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

moves.name: Metal Burst
moves.desc: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.desc: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Meteor Assault
moves.desc: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can't move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

moves.name: Meteor Mash
moves.desc: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also boost the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Mortal Spin
moves.desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Mountain Gale
moves.desc: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Multi-Attack
moves.desc: Cloaking itself in powerful energy, the user slams into the target to inflict damage. This move's type changes depending on the kind of memory disc held by the user.

moves.name: Night Slash
moves.desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Noxious Torque
moves.desc: This move is only used by a Starmobile. It may Poison the opponent

moves.name: Nuzzle
moves.desc: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Order Up
moves.desc: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Pay Day
moves.desc: Coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

moves.name: Payback
moves.desc: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

moves.name: Peck
moves.desc: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn to inflict damage.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and damages everything around it.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.desc: The user attacks by shooting sharp spikes at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Plasma Fists
moves.desc: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.desc: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Pluck
moves.desc: The user attacks by pecking the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Poison Fang
moves.desc: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.desc: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.desc: The user hits the target with its tail. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also poison the target.

moves.name: Poltergeist
moves.desc: The user attacks by controlling the target's item. This move fails if the target isn't holding an item.

moves.name: Population Bomb
moves.desc: The user's fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

moves.name: Pounce
moves.desc: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Pound
moves.desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

moves.name: Power Trip
moves.desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to lash the target.

moves.name: Precipice Blades
moves.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

moves.name: Present
moves.desc: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. The gift restores HP sometimes, however.

moves.name: Psychic Fangs
moves.desc: The user attacks by biting the target with its psychic capabilities. This move can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.desc: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Psyshield Bash
moves.desc: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This also boosts the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Pyro Ball
moves.desc: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.desc: The user lunges at the target to inflict damage, moving at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Rage Fist
moves.desc: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Raging Bull
moves.desc: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Raging Fury
moves.desc: The user rampages around spewing flames for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Rapid Spin
moves.desc: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Razor Shell
moves.desc: The user cuts the target with sharp shells to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.desc: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.desc: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Rock Blast
moves.desc: The user attacks by hurling hard rocks at the target. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.desc: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Rock Throw
moves.desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.desc: The user hurls boulders at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by cutting off its movement.

moves.name: Rock Wrecker
moves.desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.desc: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. This attack becomes more powerful each time it hits.

moves.name: Sacred Fire
moves.desc: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Sacred Sword
moves.desc: The user attacks by slicing with a sword. The target's stat changes don't affect the damage inflicted by this move.

moves.name: Salt Cure
moves.desc: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

moves.name: Sand Tomb
moves.desc: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Scale Shot
moves.desc: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.

moves.name: Scratch
moves.desc: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Seed Bomb
moves.desc: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.desc: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Self-Destruct
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

moves.name: Shadow Bone
moves.desc: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Shadow Claw
moves.desc: The user attacks by slashing the target with a sharp claw made from shadows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Shadow Force
moves.desc: The user disappears on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

moves.name: Shadow Punch
moves.desc: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Skitter Smack
moves.desc: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Sky Attack
moves.desc: The user attacks the turn after using this move. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Slam
moves.desc: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

moves.name: Slash
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Smack Down
moves.desc: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack the target. If the target is in the air, it will be knocked down to the ground.

moves.name: Smart Strike
moves.desc: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Snap Trap
moves.desc: The user snares the target in a snap trap that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Solar Blade
moves.desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then fills a blade with the light's energy and attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Spark
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with an electrically charged tackle. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Spectral Thief
moves.desc: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

moves.name: Spin Out
moves.desc: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Spirit Break
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target's spirit. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Spirit Shackle
moves.desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from fleeing.

moves.name: Steel Roller
moves.desc: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails if the ground hasn't turned into a terrain.

moves.name: Steel Wing
moves.desc: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also boost the user's Defense stat.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.desc: The user attacks by stomping on the target with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Stomping Tantrum
moves.desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

moves.name: Stone Axe
moves.desc: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack float around the target.

moves.name: Stone Edge
moves.desc: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Storm Throw
moves.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

moves.name: Strength
moves.desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

moves.name: Struggle
moves.desc: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no remaining PP. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

moves.name: Sunsteel Strike
moves.desc: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

moves.name: Super Fang
moves.desc: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with great power. This also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Surging Strikes
moves.desc: The user, having mastered the Water style, strikes the target with a flowing motion three times in a row. This move always lands a critical hit.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.desc: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Tail Slap
moves.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. This move hits two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.desc: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Thief
moves.desc: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

moves.name: Thousand Arrows
moves.desc: This move can hit opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon will be knocked down to the ground.

moves.name: Thousand Waves
moves.desc: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those it hits can't flee from battle.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.desc: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Throat Chop
moves.desc: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using sound-based moves for two turns.

moves.name: Thunder Fang
moves.desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Punch
moves.desc: The target is attacked with an electrified punch. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunderous Kick
moves.desc: The user overwhelms the target with lightning-like movement before delivering a kick. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Trailblaze
moves.desc: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

moves.name: Triple Arrows
moves.desc: The user kicks, then fires three arrows. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit and may also lower the target's Defense stat or make it flinch.

moves.name: Triple Axel
moves.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

moves.name: Triple Dive
moves.desc: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

moves.name: Triple Kick
moves.desc: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.

moves.name: Trop Kick
moves.desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: V-create
moves.desc: The user emits a hot flame from its forehead and hurls itself at the target to inflict damage. This also lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.desc: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

moves.name: Vise Grip
moves.desc: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Volt Tackle
moves.desc: The user electrifies itself and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Waterfall
moves.desc: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

moves.name: Wave Crash
moves.desc: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Wicked Blow
moves.desc: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This move always lands a critical hit.

moves.name: Wicked Torque
moves.desc: This move is only used by a Starmobile.

moves.name: Wild Charge
moves.desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into the target. This also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Wing Attack
moves.desc: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

moves.name: Wood Hammer
moves.desc: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

moves.name: Wrap
moves.desc: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes, claws, or the like as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Zing Zap
moves.desc: The user crashes into the target, delivering a powerful electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Acid
moves.desc: Opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.desc: The user attacks by spitting fluid that works to melt the target. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Aeroblast
moves.desc: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Air Cutter
moves.desc: The user launches razor-like wind to slash opposing Pokémon. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Air Slash
moves.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.desc: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also boost all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Apple Acid
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Armor Cannon
moves.desc: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Astral Barrage
moves.desc: The user attacks by sending a frightful amount of small ghosts at opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.desc: The user lets loose a pulse of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Aurora Beam
moves.desc: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Belch
moves.desc: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

moves.name: Bitter Malice
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with spine-chilling resentment. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Blast Burn
moves.desc: The target is razed by a fiery explosion. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Bleakwind Storm
moves.desc: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also lower the Speed stats of opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

moves.name: Blue Flare
moves.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Boomburst
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible explosive sound.

moves.name: Brine
moves.desc: This move's power is doubled if the target's HP is at half or less.

moves.name: Bubble Beam
moves.desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.desc: The user vibrates to generate a damaging sound wave. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Burn Up
moves.desc: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

moves.name: Burning Jealousy
moves.desc: The user attacks with energy from jealousy. This leaves all opposing Pokémon that have had their stats boosted during the turn with a burn.

moves.name: Charge Beam
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The residual electricity may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Chatter
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with sound waves of deafening chatter. This also confuses the target.

moves.name: Chilling Water
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Chloroblast
moves.desc: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user.

moves.name: Clanging Scales
moves.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat is lowered after the attack.

moves.name: Clear Smog
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are eliminated.

moves.name: Confusion
moves.desc: The target is hit with a weak telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Core Enforcer
moves.desc: If the Pokémon damaged by this move have already used their moves that turn, this move eliminates the effects of those Pokémon's Abilities.

moves.name: Dark Pulse
moves.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with ill intent. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also leave those hit by the attack with paralysis.

moves.name: Draco Meteor
moves.desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Dragon Energy
moves.desc: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.desc: The user steals the target's HP with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.desc: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Dynamax Cannon
moves.desc: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.

moves.name: Earth Power
moves.desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.

moves.name: Eerie Spell
moves.desc: The user attacks with its tremendous psychic power. This also drains 3 PP from the move last used by the target.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Electro Drift
moves.desc: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

moves.name: Electroweb
moves.desc: The user captures opposing Pokémon in an electric net to inflict damage. This also lowers their Speed stats.

moves.name: Ember
moves.desc: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Eruption
moves.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

moves.name: Esper Wing
moves.desc: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also boosts the user's Speed stat. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Expanding Force
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. When the ground is Psychic Terrain, this move's power is boosted and it damages all opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Extrasensory
moves.desc: The user attacks with an odd, unseeable power. This may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.desc: The user attacks by stirring up a fairy wind to strike the target.

moves.name: Fiery Dance
moves.desc: Cloaked in flames, the user attacks the target by dancing and flapping its wings. This may also boost the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Fiery Wrath
moves.desc: The user transforms its wrath into a fire-like aura to attack. This may also make opposing Pokémon flinch.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.desc: The user risks everything to attack the target. The user faints but inflicts damage equal to its own HP.

moves.name: Fire Blast
moves.desc: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all- consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Fire Pledge
moves.desc: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast sea of fire appears.

moves.name: Fire Spin
moves.desc: The user traps the target inside a fierce vortex of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.desc: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Fleur Cannon
moves.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Freeze-Dry
moves.desc: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

moves.name: Freezing Glare
moves.desc: The user shoots its psychic power from its eyes to attack. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Frenzy Plant
moves.desc: The user slams the target with the roots of an enormous tree. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Frost Breath
moves.desc: The user attacks by blowing its cold breath on the target. This move always lands a critical hit.

moves.name: Fusion Flare
moves.desc: The user brings down a giant flame. This move's power is boosted when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Glaciate
moves.desc: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Speed stats.

moves.name: Grass Knot
moves.desc: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Grass Pledge
moves.desc: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a vast swamp appears.

moves.name: Gust
moves.desc: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.desc: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing Pokémon. This may also leave them with a burn.

moves.name: Hex
moves.desc: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status conditions.

moves.name: Hurricane
moves.desc: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Hydro Cannon
moves.desc: The target is hit with a watery blast. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Hyper Beam
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.desc: The user attacks by letting loose a horribly loud, resounding cry.

moves.name: Hyperspace Hole
moves.desc: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.desc: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Ice Burn
moves.desc: The turn after using this move, the user surrounds the target with an ultracold, freezing wind to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.desc: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. This also lowers opposing Pokémon's Speed stats.

moves.name: Incinerate
moves.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.

moves.name: Infernal Parade
moves.desc: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

moves.name: Inferno
moves.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

moves.name: Infestation
moves.desc: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

moves.name: Judgment
moves.desc: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of plate held by the user.

moves.name: Lava Plume
moves.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

moves.name: Leaf Storm
moves.desc: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Light of Ruin
moves.desc: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user terribly.

moves.name: Lumina Crash
moves.desc: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Luster Purge
moves.desc: The user lets loose a damaging burst of light. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Magical Leaf
moves.desc: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the target. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Magma Storm
moves.desc: The user traps the target inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Make It Rain
moves.desc: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Meteor Beam
moves.desc: The user gathers energy from space and boosts its Sp. Atk stat on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

moves.name: Mind Blown
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.desc: A retaliatory attack that counters any special move, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Mist Ball
moves.desc: A mist-like flurry of down envelops and damages the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Misty Explosion
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it and faints upon using this move. This move's power is boosted on Misty Terrain.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Moongeist Beam
moves.desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Ability.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.desc: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.desc: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.desc: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.

moves.name: Mystical Fire
moves.desc: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Mystical Power
moves.desc: The user attacks by emitting a mysterious power. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Nature's Madness
moves.desc: The user hits the target with the full wrath of nature. This cuts the target's HP in half.

moves.name: Night Daze
moves.desc: The user looses a pitch-black shock wave at the target to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.desc: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

moves.name: Oblivion Wing
moves.desc: The user absorbs the target's HP. The user's HP is restored by over half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Octazooka
moves.desc: The user attacks by spraying ink in the target's face. This may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Origin Pulse
moves.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

moves.name: Overdrive
moves.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with all its might. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Photon Geyser
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat— whichever is higher for the user.

moves.name: Pollen Puff
moves.desc: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.desc: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. This may also leave opposing Pokémon frozen.

moves.name: Power Gem
moves.desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

moves.name: Prismatic Laser
moves.desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.desc: The target is hit with a strong telekinetic force to inflict damage. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

moves.name: Psystrike
moves.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This move deals physical damage.

moves.name: Relic Song
moves.desc: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep.

moves.name: Revelation Dance
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by dancing with all its might. This move becomes the same type as the user's type.

moves.name: Rising Voltage
moves.desc: The user attacks with electricity rising from the ground. This move's power is doubled if the target is on Electric Terrain.

moves.name: Roar of Time
moves.desc: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can't move on the next turn.

moves.name: Round
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a song. If others use this move, they will act immediately after the initial user, and the power of their Rounds will be boosted.

moves.name: Ruination
moves.desc: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target's HP in half.

moves.name: Sandsear Storm
moves.desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This may also leave them with a burn.

moves.name: Scald
moves.desc: The user attacks by shooting boiling hot water at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Scorching Sands
moves.desc: The user throws scorching sand at the target to attack. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Searing Shot
moves.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

moves.name: Secret Sword
moves.desc: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn deals physical damage to the target.

moves.name: Seed Flare
moves.desc: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack the target. This may also harshly lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.desc: The user attacks by hurling a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.desc: The target faints instantly. This move is less likely to hit the target if used by Pokémon other than Ice types.

moves.name: Shell Side Arm
moves.desc: This move is either physical or special—whichever will inflict more damage. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Shell Trap
moves.desc: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Shock Wave
moves.desc: The user strikes the target with a quick jolt of electricity. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Sludge
moves.desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.desc: The user hurls unsanitary sludge at the target to inflict damage. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Sludge Wave
moves.desc: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those it hits.

moves.name: Smog
moves.desc: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: Snarl
moves.desc: The user yells as if it's ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stats of opposing Pokémon.

moves.name: Snipe Shot
moves.desc: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

moves.name: Snore
moves.desc: This attack can be used only if the user is asleep. The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.desc: The user gathers light on the first turn, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

moves.name: Spacial Rend
moves.desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

moves.name: Sparkling Aria
moves.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be cured by the touch of these bubbles.

moves.name: Spit Up
moves.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is released at once in an attack. The more power is stored, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Springtide Storm
moves.desc: The user attacks by wrapping opposing Pokémon in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This may also lower their Attack stats.

moves.name: Steam Eruption
moves.desc: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Steel Beam
moves.desc: The user fires a beam of steel that it collected from its entire body. This also damages the user.

moves.name: Stored Power
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user's stats are boosted, the greater the move's power.

moves.name: Strange Steam
moves.desc: The user attacks the target by emitting steam. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.desc: The user attacks by struggling against opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Surf
moves.desc: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

moves.name: Swift
moves.desc: Star-shaped rays are shot at opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Techno Blast
moves.desc: The user attacks by firing a beam of light at the target. This move's type changes depending on the kind of drive held by the user.

moves.name: Tera Blast
moves.desc: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

moves.name: Terrain Pulse
moves.desc: The user utilizes the energy of the terrain to attack. This move's type and power change depending on the terrain at the time the move is used.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.desc: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunder Cage
moves.desc: The user traps the target inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a jolt of electricity. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a strong electric blast. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Torch Song
moves.desc: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.desc: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

moves.name: Twin Beam
moves.desc: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

moves.name: Twister
moves.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.desc: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

moves.name: Vacuum Wave
moves.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Venoshock
moves.desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move's power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Water Pledge
moves.desc: A column of water hits the target. When used with its fire counterpart, this move's power is boosted and a rainbow appears.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Water Shuriken
moves.desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Water Spout
moves.desc: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.

moves.name: Weather Ball
moves.desc: This move's type and power change depending on the weather at the time the move is used.

moves.name: Whirlpool
moves.desc: The user traps the target inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflicts damage for four to five turns.

moves.name: Wildbolt Storm
moves.desc: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave opposing Pokémon with paralysis.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.desc: The user attacks by firing an electric blast like a cannon. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Acid Armor
moves.desc: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

moves.name: Acupressure
moves.desc: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

moves.name: After You
moves.desc: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

moves.name: Agility
moves.desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply boosts its Speed stat.

moves.name: Ally Switch
moves.desc: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Aqua Ring
moves.desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

moves.name: Aromatic Mist
moves.desc: The user boosts the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

moves.name: Attract
moves.desc: If the target is of the opposite gender to the user, it becomes infatuated with the user and will sometimes be unable to use its moves.

moves.name: Aurora Veil
moves.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only when it is snowing.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.desc: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers the target's Attack stat. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Baneful Bunker
moves.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

moves.name: Baton Pass
moves.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

moves.name: Belly Drum
moves.desc: The user maximizes its Attack stat but loses HP equal to half its max HP.

moves.name: Block
moves.desc: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent the target from fleeing.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to boost its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Celebrate
moves.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!

moves.name: Charge
moves.desc: The user becomes charged, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move it uses. This also boosts the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Charm
moves.desc: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Chilly Reception
moves.desc: The user tells a chillingly bad joke before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting. This summons a snowstorm lasting five turns.

moves.name: Clangorous Soul
moves.desc: The user boosts all its stats by using some of its own HP.

moves.name: Coaching
moves.desc: The user properly coaches its ally Pokémon, boosting their Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Coil
moves.desc: The user coils up and concentrates. This boosts its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Confide
moves.desc: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Confuse Ray
moves.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

moves.name: Conversion
moves.desc: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

moves.name: Conversion 2
moves.desc: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the move the target used last.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. This move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Corrosive Gas
moves.desc: The user surrounds everything around it with highly acidic gas and melts away items held by other Pokémon.

moves.name: Cosmic Power
moves.desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to boost its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Cotton Guard
moves.desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically boosting its Defense stat.

moves.name: Cotton Spore
moves.desc: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to opposing Pokémon. This harshly lowers their Speed stats.

moves.name: Court Change
moves.desc: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

moves.name: Curse
moves.desc: A move that has different effects depending on whether the user is a Ghost type or not.

moves.name: Dark Void
moves.desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that puts them to sleep.

moves.name: Decorate
moves.desc: The user sharply boosts the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.

moves.name: Defend Order
moves.desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, boosting its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.desc: The user curls up and boosts its Defense stat.

moves.name: Defog
moves.desc: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

moves.name: Destiny Bond
moves.desc: If the user is knocked out after using this move, the Pokémon that knocked it out will also faint. This move's chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Detect
moves.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Disable
moves.desc: For four turns, the target will be unable to use whichever move it last used.

moves.name: Doodle
moves.desc: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.desc: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to boost its evasiveness.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.desc: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.desc: The user turns the ground into Electric Terrain for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.desc: If the target is electrified before it uses a move, the target's move becomes Electric type for that turn.

moves.name: Encore
moves.desc: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

moves.name: Endure
moves.desc: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. This move's chance of failing rises if used in succession.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: Fairy Lock
moves.desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.desc: The user feigns crying to fluster the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.desc: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: Fillet Away
moves.desc: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

moves.name: Flatter
moves.desc: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Floral Healing
