moves.desc: The user restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP. More HP is restored when the ground is Grassy Terrain.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.desc: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that its future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits.

moves.name: Follow Me
moves.desc: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing Pokémon take aim only at the user.

moves.name: Forest's Curse
moves.desc: The user puts a forest curse on the target. This adds Grass type to the target's type.

moves.name: Gastro Acid
moves.desc: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

moves.name: Geomancy
moves.desc: The user absorbs energy on the first turn, then sharply boosts its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

moves.name: Glare
moves.desc: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.desc: The user turns the ground into Grassy Terrain for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.

moves.name: Gravity
moves.desc: Enables Flying types or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves for five turns. Moves that involve flying can't be used.

moves.name: Growl
moves.desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stats.

moves.name: Growth
moves.desc: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Guard Split
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

moves.name: Happy Hour
moves.desc: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

moves.name: Harden
moves.desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to boost its Defense stat.

moves.name: Haze
moves.desc: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Heal Bell
moves.desc: The user makes a soothing bell chime to cure the status conditions of all its fellow party Pokémon and allies.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.desc: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Healing Wish
moves.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.desc: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

moves.name: Hold Hands
moves.desc: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

moves.name: Hone Claws
moves.desc: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

moves.name: Howl
moves.desc: The user howls loudly to rouse itself and its allies. This boosts their Attack stats.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.desc: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall asleep.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.desc: If opposing Pokémon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.desc: The user lays roots that restore its own HP every turn. Because the user is now rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Instruct
moves.desc: The user instructs the target to reuse the move last used by the target.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.desc: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

moves.name: Jungle Healing
moves.desc: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

moves.name: Kinesis
moves.desc: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

moves.name: King's Shield
moves.desc: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. This also lowers the Attack stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

moves.name: Leech Seed
moves.desc: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

moves.name: Leer
moves.desc: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.

moves.name: Life Dew
moves.desc: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special moves for five turns.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.desc: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the user's next move does not miss that target.

moves.name: Lovely Kiss
moves.desc: With a scary face, the user tries to kiss the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

moves.name: Lunar Blessing
moves.desc: The user receives a blessing from the crescent moon, restoring HP and curing status conditions for itself and its ally Pokémon currently in the battle.

moves.name: Lunar Dance
moves.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP and PP restored and its status conditions cured.

moves.name: Magic Powder
moves.desc: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target's type to Psychic.

moves.name: Magic Room
moves.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.desc: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Magnetic Flux
moves.desc: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which boosts the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus Ability or the Minus Ability.

moves.name: Max Guard
moves.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Mean Look
moves.desc: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

moves.name: Memento
moves.desc: The user faints. In return, the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats are harshly lowered.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.desc: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.desc: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

moves.name: Milk Drink
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.desc: The user copies the move last used by the target. The copied move can be used until the user of Mimic leaves the battle.

moves.name: Minimize
moves.desc: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply boosts its evasiveness.

moves.name: Mist
moves.desc: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Morning Sun
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: No Retreat
moves.desc: This move boosts all the user's stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.

moves.name: Noble Roar
moves.desc: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Obstruct
moves.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker's Defense stat.

moves.name: Octolock
moves.desc: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target's Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

moves.name: Pain Split
moves.desc: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally splits the combined HP between the target and itself.

moves.name: Parting Shot
moves.desc: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Perish Song
moves.desc: Any Pokémon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

moves.name: Play Nice
moves.desc: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Poison Gas
moves.desc: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the faces of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those it hits.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

moves.name: Power Shift
moves.desc: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Power Split
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

moves.name: Power Trick
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

moves.name: Protect
moves.desc: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.desc: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Psychic Terrain
moves.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

moves.name: Purify
moves.desc: The user cures the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

moves.name: Quash
moves.desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Rage Powder
moves.desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opposing Pokémon aim only at the user.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.desc: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type attacks. The rain also lowers the power of Fire-type attacks.

moves.name: Recover
moves.desc: The user regenerates its cells, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Recycle
moves.desc: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.desc: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical moves for five turns.

moves.name: Reflect Type
moves.desc: The user reflects the target's type to become the same type as the target.

moves.name: Rest
moves.desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and cures any status conditions.

moves.name: Revival Blessing
moves.desc: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

moves.name: Roar
moves.desc: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply boosts the user's Speed stat.

moves.name: Role Play
moves.desc: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's Ability.

moves.name: Roost
moves.desc: The user lands and rests its body. This move restores the user's HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.desc: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.desc: Sand is hurled in the target's face, lowering the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.desc: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to damage all Pokémon except Rock, Ground, and Steel types. The sandstorm also boosts the Sp. Def stats of Rock types.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.desc: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

moves.name: Screech
moves.desc: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Shed Tail
moves.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Shell Smash
moves.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Shelter
moves.desc: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, sharply boosting its Defense stat.

moves.name: Shift Gear
moves.desc: The user rotates its gears, boosting its Attack stat and sharply boosting its Speed stat.

moves.name: Shore Up
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP. It regains more HP in a sandstorm.

moves.name: Silk Trap
moves.desc: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

moves.name: Simple Beam
moves.desc: The user emits a mysterious psychic wave that changes the target's Ability to Simple.

moves.name: Sing
moves.desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a beautiful voice that puts the target to sleep.

moves.name: Sketch
moves.desc: This move enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

moves.name: Skill Swap
moves.desc: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

moves.name: Slack Off
moves.desc: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.desc: The user scatters a cloud of soporific dust that puts the target to sleep.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.desc: The user randomly uses one of the moves it knows. This move can only be used while the user is asleep.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Snowscape
moves.desc: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

moves.name: Soak
moves.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water that changes the target's type to Water.

moves.name: Soft-Boiled
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP by up to half its max HP.

moves.name: Speed Swap
moves.desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

moves.name: Spicy Extract
moves.desc: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Spikes
moves.desc: The user lays a trap of spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will damage opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Spiky Shield
moves.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker that makes direct contact.

moves.name: Spite
moves.desc: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Splash
moves.desc: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

moves.name: Spore
moves.desc: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching into battle.

moves.name: Stockpile
moves.desc: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.

moves.name: Strength Sap
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.desc: The user blows silk from its mouth that binds opposing Pokémon and harshly lowers their Speed stats.

moves.name: Stuff Cheeks
moves.desc: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply boosts its Defense stat.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.desc: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its own HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.desc: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type attacks. The sunlight also lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.desc: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply boosts the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Swallow
moves.desc: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to restore its own HP. The more power is stored, the more HP is restored.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.desc: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.desc: The user releases a scent that harshly lowers opposing Pokémon's evasiveness.

moves.name: Switcheroo
moves.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Synthesis
moves.desc: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Defense stats.

moves.name: Tailwind
moves.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that boosts the Speed stats of itself and its allies for four turns.

moves.name: Take Heart
moves.desc: The user lifts its spirits, curing its own status conditions and boosting its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Tar Shot
moves.desc: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target's Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.desc: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Tearful Look
moves.desc: The user gets teary-eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Teatime
moves.desc: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon currently in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

moves.name: Teeter Dance
moves.desc: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses every Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.desc: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, if any. If a wild Pokémon uses this move, it flees.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.desc: The user tickles the target into laughing, lowering its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Tidy Up
moves.desc: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user's Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Topsy-Turvy
moves.desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

moves.name: Torment
moves.desc: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.desc: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Toxic Spikes
moves.desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

moves.name: Toxic Thread
moves.desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Transform
moves.desc: The user transforms into a copy of the target, right down to having the same move set.

moves.name: Trick
moves.desc: The user catches the target off guard and swaps the target's held item with its own.

moves.name: Trick Room
moves.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

moves.name: Trick-or-Treat
moves.desc: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

moves.name: Victory Dance
moves.desc: The user performs an intense dance to usher in victory, boosting its Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

moves.name: Whirlwind
moves.desc: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Wish
moves.desc: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by up to half the user's max HP.

moves.name: Withdraw
moves.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, boosting its Defense stat.

moves.name: Wonder Room
moves.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

moves.name: Work Up
moves.desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are boosted.

moves.name: Worry Seed
moves.desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.desc: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.
